StringReg.Name: DeviceGUID
StringReg.ToolTip: USB3 Vision GUID of the device the controller is connected to.
StringReg.Description: USB3 Vision GUID of the device the controller is connected to.

Enumeration.Name: ConnectionSpeed
Enumeration.ToolTip: Effective connection speed to the device once connected.
Enumeration.Description: Effective connection speed to the device once connected.

Integer.Name: HeartbeatInterval
Integer.ToolTip: Time between each heartbeat sent by the software.
Integer.Description: Time in milliseconds between each heartbeat sent to the USB3 Vision device.

Integer.Name: CIPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Packet size used for device control.
Integer.Description: Packet size of the control channel end point in bytes.

Integer.Name: CISuccess
Integer.ToolTip: Count of control commands success.
Integer.Description: Count of control commands success.

Integer.Name: CIPendingAcknowledge
Integer.ToolTip: Count of control pending acknowledge.
Integer.Description: Count of control pending acknowledge.

Integer.Name: CICancelled
Integer.ToolTip: Count of cancelled commands.
Integer.Description: Count of cancelled commands.

Integer.Name: CITimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Count of command timeouts.
Integer.Description: Count of command timeouts.

Integer.Name: CILinkError
Integer.ToolTip: Count of link error.
Integer.Description: Count of link error.

Integer.Name: CIFormattingRequestError
Integer.ToolTip: Count of formatting request error.
Integer.Description: Count of formatting request error.

Integer.Name: CIMalformedAcknowledge
Integer.ToolTip: Count of malformed acknowledge.
Integer.Description: Count of malformed acknowledge.

Integer.Name: CIDiscardedLateAcknowledge
Integer.ToolTip: Count of discarded late acknowledge.
Integer.Description: Count of discarded late acknowledge.

Integer.Name: EIPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Packet size used for device events.
Integer.Description: Packet size of the messaging channel end point in bytes.

Integer.Name: SIChannel
Integer.ToolTip: Stream channel selector.
Integer.Description: Stream channel selector for the parameters in the StreamInterface category.

Integer.Name: SIPayloadSizeAlignment
Integer.ToolTip: Limits streaming size registers to byte size alignment.
Integer.Description: Limits streaming size registers to byte size alignment. Updated when streaming is enabled on the device.

Integer.Name: SIRequiredPayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Device reported minimum required payload size with current settings.
Integer.Description: Device reported minimum required payload size with current settings. Updated when streaming is enabled on the device.

Integer.Name: SIRequiredLeaderSize
Integer.ToolTip: Device reported minimum required leader size.
Integer.Description: Device reported minimum required leader size. Updated when streaming is enabled on the device.

Integer.Name: SIRequiredTrailerSize
Integer.ToolTip: Device reported minimum required trailer size.
Integer.Description: Device reported minimum required trailer size. Updated when streaming is enabled on the device.

Integer.Name: SIMaximumLeaderSize
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum leader size configured on the device and driver.
Integer.Description: Maximum leader size configured on the device and driver. Updated when streaming is enabled on the device.

Integer.Name: SIPayloadTransferSize
Integer.ToolTip: Expected size of a single payload as configured on the device and driver.
Integer.Description: Expected size of a single payload as configured on the device and driver. Updated when streaming is enabled on the device.

Integer.Name: SIPayloadTransferCount
Integer.ToolTip: Expected number of payload transfers as configured on the device and driver.
Integer.Description: Expected number of payload transfers as configured on the device and driver. Updated when streaming is enabled on the device.

Integer.Name: SIPayloadFinalTransfer1Size
Integer.ToolTip: Size of the first final payload transfer as configured on the device and driver.
Integer.Description: Size of the first final payload transfer as configured on the device and driver. Updated when streaming is enabled on the device.

Integer.Name: SIPayloadFinalTransfer2Size
Integer.ToolTip: Size of the second final payload transfer as configured on the device and driver.
Integer.Description: Size of the second final payload transfer as configured on the device and driver. Updated when streaming is enabled on the device.

Integer.Name: SIMaximumTrailerSize
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum trailer size as configured on the device and driver.
Integer.Description: Maximum trailer size as configured on the device and driver. Updated when streaming is enabled on the device.

Integer.Name: SIMaximumPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum packet size that can be used on the streaming end point.
Integer.Description: Maximum packet size that can be used on the streaming end point. Automatically set on connection. Used when computing the various stream interface sizes.

Integer.Name: SICustomPayloadTransferSize
Integer.ToolTip: Custom payload size to use when setting SIPayloadTransferSize.
Integer.Description: Custom payload size to use when setting SIPayloadSize. If 0, the payload transfer size is configured automatically by the device controller. The custom payload size is only used as a starting point and can be adjusted to meet other constraints like payload size alignment.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceGenICamXMLLocation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which GenICaml XML file SDK will use to build the device node map on the next connect.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which genicam configuration file the SDK will use for the next connect. "Default" goes through all manifest entries (if supported) until the device node map can be successfully built. "File" reads from the XML file in the location specified by DeviceGenICamXMLFile.

StringReg.Name: DeviceGenICamXMLFile
StringReg.ToolTip: The location on the hard drive (absolute path) where the local XML file is loaded from when DeviceXMLLocation is set to "File".
StringReg.Description: The location on the hard drive (absolute path) where the local XML file is loaded from when DeviceXMLLocation is set to "File".

Boolean.Name: LinkRecoveryEnabled
Boolean.ToolTip: When enabled, SDK attempts to automatically reconnect to the same device when the connection is lost. SDK does not recover the stream. Application is responsible for stream recovery.
Boolean.Description: When enabled, SDK attempts to automatically reconnect to the same device when the connection is lost. SDK does not recover the stream. Application is responsible for stream recovery.

Enumeration.Name: RecoveryStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Status of the connection and stream state machine.
Enumeration.Description: Status of the connection and stream state machine.

Integer.Name: Connected
Integer.ToolTip: ToolTip
Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: ChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: How many stream channels the device has.
Integer.Description: How many stream channels the device has. 0 is returned if not connected.

Integer.Name: RequiredPayloadSizeHigh
Integer.ToolTip: ToolTip
Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: RequiredPayloadSizeLow
Integer.ToolTip: ToolTip
Integer.Description: Description

Port.Name: Device
Port.ToolTip: Port giving access to the device.
